thread.title: AB
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by AB

author: AB
title: AB
text: We ordered a coat for a Christmas present for our son. We didn't get the sizing right so we returned it and asked for a size smaller. Unfortunately when the smaller version arrived it was still too big, so we returned it again and at the third attempt, got the right size for him! Country Attire were superb and very swift in dealing with the exchanges - all processed and delivered to us within a couple of days. Thank you!
